content.content:
`.grids`

Use the **grids** resource to create, read, update and delete product grids in
a merchant's store, you can edit all grid properties and also work with all
grid subresources directly at this resource

description.content: Grid title - Max length: **70**
Grid title translations - Max properties: **10**
Translated full grid title - Max length: **255**
Unique identifier, grid name using only lowercase, numbers and underscore - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9_]{2,30}$`**
Pre-defined options for this grid, used in specifications, customization and variations - Max elements: **3000**
Unique ID (ObjectID) - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
Unique identifier, option name using only lowercase, numbers and underscore - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9_]{2,30}$`**
Option text value displayed for the client - Max length: **255**
Default normalized value to use in integrations - Max length: **200**
Normalized values to use in specific integrations (ID in property) - Max properties: **5**
Attribute text value - Max length: **200**
Option color palette (if the grid involves colors), starting by main color - Max elements: **6**
RGB code with #
Default price alteration for product with this option for customization or variations
Type of price addition
Additional value, could be negative - Mininum: **-99999999** - Maximum: **99999999**
If this grid accept custom value defined by customer (product customization)
If this grid accept customer file attachment
Default price alteration for product with this grid for customization or variations
Type of price addition
Additional value, could be negative - Mininum: **-99999999** - Maximum: **99999999**
List of custom attributes - Max elements: **100**
Unique ID (ObjectID) - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
String to help distinguish who (or which app) created and can use the metafield - Max length: **30**
Field name - Max length: **50**
Custom property value - Max length: **255**
Flags to associate additional info - Max elements: **10**
Flag title
Optional notes with additional info about this grid - Max length: **255**

content.content:
*/grids.json?limit&offset&sort&fields\&[field]* > Authentication
_GET_: **none** Use [default URL parameters](#introduction/overview/url-params) (metadata) for pagination and ordering, you can use any other parameter to query by particular object properties

description.content: Max number of objects to return
First entry to return
Rules to order resultant objects
Object properties to return
Object property to query

content.content:
*/grids.json* > Authentication
_POST_: **required** Request body must obey the specifications of [this model](#reference/grids/grid-object)

*/grids/[_id].json* > Authentication
_GET_: **none**
_PATCH_, _PUT_, _DELETE_: **required** In read requests, response body will follow [this model](#reference/grids/grid-object) For overwriting and editing, request body must obey the same specifications, but especially for edit requests there are no required fields

description.content: The grid ID
The grid ID
The grid ID
The grid ID
